Course Description: INTRODUCTION TO MANAGERIAL ACCOUNTING CONCEPTS INCLUDING FINANCIAL STATEMENT ANALYSIS, ACCOUNTINGS ROLE IN MANAGEMENT DECISION-MAKING, COST CONCEPTS AND BEHAVIOR, JOB ORDER AND PROCESS COST ACCOUNTING, COST-VOLUME-PROFIT ANALYSIS RESPONSIBILITY ACCOUNTING, DIFFERENTIAL ANALYSIS AND CAPITAL INVESTMENT ANALYSIS. (THIS IS THE SECOND COURSE IN AN INTRODUCTORY SERIES.)
Transfer Status: GUARANTEED TRANSFER TO INSTITUTION OFFERING SAME COURSE.
